body:
Ayyy! Pretty slow game, but my Broncos won! Got me into football even though it was a slow game. xd


Discuss your opinions!
body_tagged:
Ayyy! Pretty slow game, but my Broncos won! Got me into football even though it was a slow game. xd


Discuss your opinions!
title: Super Bowl 50

replies.body: Well I watched just about the entire game from snapchat but halftime looked good.
replies.body_tagged: Well I watched just about the entire game from snapchat but halftime looked good.

replies.body: It was an okay game I am a steelers fan but I was voting for the Broncos. I fell asleep in the last 4 minutes so I don't really know what happened but I know they won! Glad to see Peyton win one last game! (Maybe)
replies.body_tagged: It was an okay game I am a steelers fan but I was voting for the Broncos. I fell asleep in the last 4 minutes so I don't really know what happened but I know they won! Glad to see Peyton win one last game! (Maybe)

replies.body:
You took my thread bro we made it in a 5 minute difference LOL
PEOPLE GO LOOK AT MY THREAD.
Yo though, my boys won 24-10, Cam Newton can eat a nutsack, Von Miller FTW. Steelers are my favorite team,wish they made it though ;(

5 minute difference, Imma go cry in a corner

replies.body:
Fluke.

Next year with all of their receivers back and the best quarterback in football the Packers are gonna win Super Bowl 51.

Also Cam Newton obviously doesn't care about winning, he backed away from trying to get the ball after he fumbled it.

replies.body:
I know the feeling, Andrew luck was out or unhealthy all season, so I cannot wait for a healthy Andrew Luck lead colts team.

But WOOHOO I'm so happy for Peyton, he deserved another ring, it wasn't his doing, but he deserved another one and how about that defense, phenomenal
